attributes.action: Reduce the insurance costs of new riders on 125cc bikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a small 125cc motorcycle worth £1700 and i have to pay close to £500 insurance because of the area. This is not fair as a CBT test makes sure you are safe and these prices are ridiculous for such small machines.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
